member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Chat.SfAIAssistView.EnableStopResponding
member.summary:
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the "Stop Responding" option is enabled or disabled.
When set to true, users can manually stop the AI response using the stop responding button. When set to false, the option is disabled, preventing users from interrupting the response. The default value is false.
<syncfusion:SfAIAssistView EnableStopResponding="True"/>

members.member:
Gets or sets the command to be executed when the Stop Responding view is clicked.
This command allows handling user interactions when they choose to stop an ongoing response. It can be bound to a command in the ViewModel to execute specific logic.
///
<syncfusion:SfAIAssistView StopRespondingCommand="{Binding StopCommand}" />

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Chat.SfAIAssistView.StopRespondingTemplate
member.summary:
Gets or sets the template used to define the Stop Responding view of the .
This property allows customization of the appearance and layout of the Stop Responding view. The provided can include UI elements such as buttons, icons, or messages.
<syncfusion:SfAIAssistView> <syncfusion:SfAIAssistView.StopRespondingTemplate> <DataTemplate> <StackPanel Orientation="Horizontal"> <TextBlock Text="Stopping..." /> </StackPanel> </DataTemplate> </syncfusion:SfAIAssistView.StopRespondingTemplate> </syncfusion:SfAIAssistView>

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Chat.SfAIAssistView.ResponseToolbarItems
member.summary: Gets or sets the collection of response toolbar items.

remarks.para: This property allows you to customize the toolbar actions available for response messages (AI messages).
By default, the collection includes "Copy", "Regenerate", "Like", and "Dislike" toolbar items. You can add custom toolbar items to this collection.

member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the response toolbar is visible in the SfAIAssistView control.

member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the input textbox toolbar is visible in the SfAIAssistView control.

member.summary: Gets or sets the collection of input toolbar items.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Chat.ToolbarItemBase.ItemTemplate
member.summary: Gets or sets the template for the toolbar item.

remarks.para: This property allows you to customize the appearance of individual toolbar items.
When set, this template will be used instead of the default template to render the toolbar item.
If this property is null, a default template will be used.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Chat.ResponseToolbarItem.IsLiked
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the toolbar item is selected.

remarks.para: This property is used to track the selection state of toolbar items, particularly for Like and Dislike actions.
When a toolbar item is selected, its visual appearance changes to indicate the selected state.
